metadata.source: Durgaparasad and Kashinath Pandurang Parab, Bombay 1890, Kâvyamâlâ : a Collection of Old and Rare Sanskrit Kâvyas ... [= 'collective' Kavyamala series], Part VI, pp. 66-118.

children.text: sarvaṃ na pāke virasaṃ yadi syāt
spṛśati na dayāṃ dainyāpanne vijātitayā śaṭhaḥ
nārthaṃ śṛṇoti na punaḥ sthitimīhate vā
sparśaṃ na vetti na rasaṃ na tathādhivāsam
bhogairdhanena ca tadā vada kiṃ karoti
dhānyairdhanena ca tadā vada kiṃ karoti
paryante vapuṣaḥ karoti puruṣaḥ kiṃ śalyatulyairdhanaiḥ
śīlaṃ naiva bibharti kīrtivimale dhatte na dharme dhiyaṃ
mīmāṃsā virasā na śoṣayati kiṃ tarkairalaṃ karkaśaiḥ
na kṣībaḥ patati smarabhramakaraiḥ kiṃ navyakāvyāsavais
ityete munayo 'pi darpaviphale yāte śrute śocyatāṃ
śīle rāgamahoṣmaṇā vigalite dveṣeṇa nāśaṃ gatāḥ
spṛśati matiṃ nahi teṣāṃ dveṣaviṣaḥ kalisarpaḥ /
yadi śamavimalamatīnāṃ svamanasi bhavati na darpaḥ //
tadā kva rūpaṃ kva ca yauvanaśrīḥ
vighnaṃ na cakrurnanu nṛttalīlāsaṃdarśane puṇyavatāṃ narāṇām /
sarvāśī satataṃ pradhāvati mahākālaḥ sa ko 'pyākulaḥ
yaḥ kārtavīryasya ca doḥsahasraṃ viccheda vīro nahi yudhi jāmadagnyaḥ /
iti tyāgodagraṃ vahati kila darpaṃ manasi yas
nānyāyena yadarjitaṃ paradhanasparśena śaptaṃ na yat
dattvā duḥkhaśataṃ na yatsvavacasā paścānna yadgaṇyate
śāntiṃ gatau kiṃ tu na kāmakopau
ityuktaṃ tripurāriṇā girisutā śrutvā yathārthaṃ vaco
